comment: Lemma for the proof that the limit of sigma-measurable functions is sigma-measurable, Proposition 121F (a) of [Fremlin1] p. 38 . This lemma proves that the preimages of right-closed, unbounded-below intervals are in the subspace sigma-algebra induced by ` D ` . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
